doc.name: DDEGetNToken
doc.description: DDEGetNToken is a test class used to test the consumption of tokens and check relevant parameters. DDEGetNToken can retrieve N tokens where 'N' is set in the constructor. For each token retrieved, the current time at the time of consumption and the actual consumed token can be queried. The queries can take place after the completion of Manager.run().
doc.author: John S. Davis II
